events.title: An Enchanted Evening with Three Mexican Tenors : Tucson Symphony
events.location: Tucson, Arizona, United States Of America
events.description: Tucson Symphony Orchestra José Luis Gomez, conductor Jorge Lopez-Yañez, Bernardo Bermudez, and José Luis Ordóñez, tenors Bursting with charm and charisma, The Three Mexican Tenors take you on a journey from operatic songs like "Libiamo" and "O Sole Mio" to pop hits as "You Raise Me Up" and "Time to Say Goodbye." The Three Mexican Tenors then pay tribute to the great singers of Mexico: Luis Miguel, Juan Gabriel, Vicente Fernandez, and more!
